sense.name: remove impurities; increase concentration of; give off
sense.commentary: NOTE: Refers to any LIQUID undergoing the distillation process. Can also refer to extracting specific components from a liquid (as a liquid). Can also include metaphorical instances like example3.
sense.examples: He distilled the vodka for a better flavor. When you distill water you remove minerals and other impurities. Tim O'Reilly has distilled the lessons from the Kathy Sierra affair. The optometrist distilled a few drops of liquid into her eyes to dialate them.

sense.name: change from gas to liquid
sense.commentary: NOTE: A state change is imperative for an instance to be tagged as this sense.
sense.examples: The acid distills at 30 degrees Farenheit.
